page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Over 30% of the male population work in manufacturing which means travelling outside the area, principally to work in the shipyards and engineering works in Barrow, or the cellophane and paper tissue mills in Barrow,or the factory producing antibiotics in Ulverston.Agriculture, Distribution and Catering,and other services are the next three largest categories each having about 15% of the male work force.Unemployment among males is about 5%.Female employment is principally in Services (over 50%) about 20% in Distribution and Catering and about 10% in Manufacturing. The total population of the area is less than 1000.
